price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߐߘߏ߲߬ ߸ ߟߊ߬ߛߋ߬ߟߌ߬ ߘߐߞߣߍߣߍ߲ ߘߐߙߐ߲߫ ߠߵߌߟߋ ߡߊ߬
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
